Introduction

Hangeng is a Chinese Mandopop singer and actor under Yuehua Entertainment. He is a former vocalist and lead dancer of the Korean boy group SUPER JUNIOR and it's Mandarin Chinese sub-unit SUPER JUNIOR-M under SM Entertainment.
He pursued a solo career in China after leaving SM Entertainment and SUPER JUNIOR in 2010.

He got married to actress and model Celina Jade on December 31, 2019 in New Zealand.

On May 8, 2022, Hangeng and his wife, Celina Jade announced that Celina is pregnant and they will be expecting their first child together.
On September 9, 2022, Hangeng and his wife, Celina Jade announced through Hangeng's personal Weibo account that Celina had given birth to their first child.
